sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkImageIslandRemoval2D computes the area of separate islands in a mask image. It removes any island that has less than AreaThreshold pixels. Output has the same ScalarType as input. It generates the whole 2D output image for any output request.
To create an instance of class vtkImageIslandRemoval2D, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkImageIslandRemoval2D

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
The class vtkImageIslandRemoval2D has several methods that can be used. They are listed below. Note that the documentation is translated automatically from the VTK sources, and may not be completely intelligible. When in doubt, consult the VTK website. In the methods listed below, obj is an instance of the vtkImageIslandRemoval2D class.

int = obj.IsA (string name) - Constructor: Sets default filter to be identity.
